content.title: Intro
content.content:
2017
Preceded by
2017
2018
Year
2019
Followed by
2019

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2018.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
24 - Ursula K. Le Guin dies.
? - Amon Hen 269 is published.

content.title: March
content.content:
22 - Pagan Saints in Middle-earth is published.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
? - Amon Hen 270 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
10 - HarperCollins announce that The Fall of Gondolin will be published on 30 August 2018.
24 - Robert Murray dies.
30 - Poetry and Song in the works of J.R.R. Tolkien is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
3 - Beren and Lúthien is published in paperback.
31 - The Hobbit Facsimile Gift Edition is published in the UK
? - Amon Hen 271 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
1 - Bodleian Library's exhibition "Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth" begins. The companion books Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth and Tolkien: Treasures will also be published.
5 - Uncle Curro. J.R.R. Tolkien's Spanish Connection is published, a translation of La Conexion Española de J.R.R. Tolkien.
11 - Where the Shadows Lie: A Jungian Interpretation of Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
1 - The Tolkien Society Seminar at the Hilton, Leeds.
? - Amon Hen 272 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
30 - The Fall of Gondolin is published.
30 - Tolkien Calendar 2019 is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
20 - 23 - Oxonmoot 2018 at St Antony's College.
? - Amon Hen 273 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
4 - A Middle-earth Traveller is published.
28 - Bodleian Library's exhibition "Tolkien: Maker of Middle-earth" ends.

? - American writer Rod Jellema dies.
Years
2015 2016 2017 2018 2019 2020 2021
